IS457

This is the course website for Data Storytelling.

Below, you will find the materials for each week, as well as the syllabus that includes contact information and a course outline.

Lectures and Materials

Week 1

Week 1 - Introduction

overview concepts

Lecture 1.1 - Introduction to this course

The syllabus for the course, what we're going to talk about, and some get-to-know-you.

Lecture 1.2 - A few items about quizzes, Names activity

Announcements and Names Activity.

Week 2

Week 2 - Story structure and Google Data Studio

overview concepts

Lecture 2.2 - A few annoucements

Announcements and Names Activity.

Week 3

Week 3 - Data Sources & Groups

data sources TurnItIn

Lecture 3.1 - Group Contracts & a bit about attendance

Groups are formed! We'll also review attendance policies.

Lecture 3.2 - A bit about TurnItIn

A bit about TurnItIn and how we'll use it in this class.

Week 4

Week 4 - Peer-reviewed resources & Interactive Graphs with GDS

data sources Assignment 2

Lecture 4.1 - Data Sources & Viz for Villiany Assignment

Mostly chatting data sources, some discussion about Assignment 2.

Week 5

Week 5 - More with GDS & Assignment #2 practice

Week 6

Week 6 - Data Storytelling Attributes

Final data stories

Lecture 6.1 - Groups for Final Data Stories (3a,b,c)

Group formation for final data stories

Lecture 6.2 - Feedback from Assignment 2(a)

Feedback on Viz for Villiany Proposals

Week 7

Week 7 - Finish up with Google Data Studio

GDS

Lecture 7.1 - A few announcements

More practice with GDS

Week 8

Week 8 - Framing Devices and Assignment # 3 feedback

Week 9

Week 9 - Twine as a Framing Device

framing devices

Lecture 9.1 -- Framing Devices

How to frame your story and introduce it to your audience.

Week 10

Week 10 - Data Narratives & more with Twine

characters data characters

Lecture 10.2 - Data Character in Story

Mapping kinds of data to storytelling characters.

Week 11

Week 11 - Data Characters & more with Twine

data narratives framing devices

Lecture 11.1 -- Data Narratives

Different narrative styles for use with data.

Week 12

Week 13 - Expectations for Final Data Stories

data narratives framing devices

Lecture 13.2 -- Expectations & Format for Final Data Stories

Different narrative styles for use with data.
